title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface, multi-model chat, RAG, admin panel).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli-ui
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for Ollama built with Textual; browse, chat, and manage models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt
summary: Next.js chat template that proxies OpenAI calls to Ollama; drop-in replacement for ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; chat, generate, and pull models from C# / F# applications.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run private LLM completions and summarization using Ollama inside your vault.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies; deploy via Docker.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively manage Ollama models and prompts as infrastructure.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that ingests PDFs/URLs, embeds with Ollama, and answers questions over your docs.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering Ollama generators and embedders for production NLP pipelines.
